document.discussion_title: Tetra Tech Inc. (NASDAQ:TTEK) Receives $34.67 Consensus Price Target from Brokerages
document.topic_text: Tweet Shares of Tetra Tech Inc. (NASDAQ:TTEK) have earned a consensus recommendation of “Hold” from the eight brokerages that are covering the stock. Five investment analysts have rated the stock with a hold recommendation and three have given a buy recommendation to the company. The average 1-year price objective among brokerages that have issued ratings on the stock in the last year is $34.67. In other Tetra Tech news, EVP Leslie L. Shoemaker sold 16,750 shares of Tetra Tech stock in a transaction that occurred on Monday, August 8th. The shares were sold at an average price of $33.42, for a total value of $559,785.00. The transaction was disclosed in a filing with the Securities & Exchange Commission, which is available at the SEC website . Also, Director J Kenneth Thompson sold 8,000 shares of Tetra Tech stock in a transaction that occurred on Wednesday, August 3rd. The stock was sold at an average price of $32.75, for a total transaction of $262,000.00. Following the completion of the sale, the director now directly owns 20,930 shares of the company’s stock, valued at approximately $685,457.50. The disclosure for this sale can be found here . TTEK has been the subject of several analyst reports. Canaccord Genuity raised shares of Tetra Tech from a “hold” rating to a “buy” rating in a research report on Tuesday, May 31st. Zacks Investment Research raised shares of Tetra Tech from a “sell” rating to a “hold” rating in a research report on Monday, July 25th. FBR & Co raised their price target on shares of Tetra Tech from $32.00 to $36.00 and gave the company a “market perform” rating in a research report on Friday, July 29th. Finally, Oppenheimer Holdings Inc. downgraded shares of Tetra Tech to a “hold” rating in a research report on Thursday, April 28th. Shares of Tetra Tech ( NASDAQ:TTEK ) opened at 34.70 on Friday. Tetra Tech has a 52-week low of $22.85 and a 52-week high of $34.79. The firm’s 50 day moving average price is $32.64 and its 200 day moving average price is $29.92. The stock has a market cap of $1.99 billion and a P/E ratio of 97.47. Tetra Tech (NASDAQ:TTEK) last announced its earnings results on Wednesday, July 27th. The company reported $0.50 earnings per share for the quarter, meeting the Zacks’ consensus estimate of $0.50. The business had revenue of $667 million for the quarter, compared to the consensus estimate of $498.79 million. Tetra Tech’s revenue for the quarter was up 16.0% on a year-over-year basis. During the same period in the prior year, the business posted $0.43 EPS. On average, analysts expect that Tetra Tech will post $1.88 EPS for the current year. The business also recently announced a quarterly dividend, which will be paid on Wednesday, August 31st. Shareholders of record on Friday, August 12th will be given a $0.09 dividend. This represents a $0.36 dividend on an annualized basis and a yield of 1.04%. The ex-dividend date is Wednesday, August 10th. Tetra Tech, Inc is a provider of consulting, engineering, program management, construction management, and technical services. The Company’s segments include Water, Environment and Infrastructure (WEI), Resource Management and Energy (RME), and Remediation and Construction Management (RCM). The WEI segment provides consulting and engineering services. Tetra Tech Inc. Tetra Tech Inc.
